subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth, the winner of the Masters and the U.S. Open, is a stroke behind David Lingmerth. Play was suspended by a thunderstorm before the second round could be completed.
snippet: Jordan Spieth, the winner of the Masters and the U.S. Open, is a stroke behind David Lingmerth. Play was suspended by a thunderstorm before the second round could be completed.
